description: The Author is the name given to one of the uncles of Dipper and Mabel Pines.

questions.answer: The Author in Gravity Falls has his own alphabet with 26 symbols, one for each letter from the Latin alphabet. To encrypt a message with The Author cipher is a replacement of each letter with the corresponding symbol. LetterSymbolLetterSymbolABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ Example: GRAVITY is written

questions.answer: The Author is revealed in the second part of Season 2 of Gravity Falls.
